segments.text: Good evening . This is Peter in Room 310 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good evening . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to Beijing early tomorrow morning . And I'd like to request an early morning call . Will that give you much trouble ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no , never . What's the exact time you'd like us to call you tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , my train is due to take off at 7:25 a . m . I've no idea how long it'll take to drive to the railway station .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It won't take long . 20 minutes is enough . Is that OK if I call you at 6:30 a . m . ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a pleasure . Good night . Have a good sleep .
segments.speaker: S2
